div.font: Global configuration contains trading account numbers, email addresses and passwords.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 307px; height: 1px; padding-top: 160px; margin-left: 401px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 16px
font-size: 16px
div.font: Strategy configuration files are used to control the strategy modules, which may be tuned through strategy parameters, such as trading timeframes technical analysis parameters.

div.style: font-size: 16px

switch.text: Strategy configuration files are used t...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 265px; height: 1px; padding-top: 279px; margin-left: 417px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 16px
div.font: The strategy modules contain the logic behind trading strategies, and are used to generate trading signals based on price data.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 411px; margin-left: 308px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font: AutoTrader is the trading management interface. For each unique combination of strategy and trading instrument, AutoTrader will deploy a trading bot dedicated to watching the price of a single instrument and trading it based on the logic defined in the strategy module.

switch.text: AutoTrader is the trading management interface. For ea...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 333px; height: 1px; padding-top: 577px; margin-left: 457px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 16px
div.font: Each trading bot focuses on two things: the instrument it has been assigned to trade and the strategy
with which to trade that instrument. When it generates a trading signal, it will process the signal and submit it to the broker interface.

switch.text: Each trading bot focuses on two things: th...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 470px; height: 1px; padding-top: 761px; margin-left: 296px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 16px
div.font: Each broker supported by AutoTrader has its own module, which connects the trading bots to the broker's API. When the module receives a signal, it will translate it so that the broker-specific API can understand it. This means that you don't have to go to all the effort of learning the nuances of a broker's API.

switch.text: Each broker supported by AutoTrader has its own module, whi...
